#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() 
{
	int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        if(n%2 == 1 || n==2 || n==4 || n==10) 
            printf("RIDICULOUS\n");
        else if(n == 6 || n==12 || n==18) 
            printf("NO\n");
        else
            printf("YES\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
